Method Detail

getConnection

public AbstractDerbyConnection getConnection()

canBackup

public boolean canBackup()
Description copied from interface: ResourceLoader
Determine whether the loader has files available to back-up (i.e. ResourceLoader.update() has run successfully at least once.

Returns:
can backup loader output

canRevert

public boolean canRevert()
Description copied from interface: ResourceLoader
Determine whether the loader has files available to revert (i.e. ResourceLoader.backup() has been called).

Returns:
can revert loader output

backup

public void backup()
Description copied from interface: ResourceLoader
Create a backup of this loaders output, this method should be called before any calls to ResourceLoader.update() to ensure that ResourceLoader.revert() can be called should a problem occur. The call to this method before ResourceLoader.update() is not enforced but automatically calling it may be beneficial in a user-centric update manager.

revert

public void revert()
Description copied from interface: ResourceLoader
Revert changes made by the last call to ResourceLoader.update(). This method will replace the current loader output with the backup (if available)

clean

public void clean()
Description copied from interface: ResourceLoader
Remove all files and directories produced by this loader including the backups. This method will render dependant query services useless, therefore if this method is used in a user-interface the application should be prompted whether they really want to 'clean' the loader.

getName

public String getName()
Description copied from interface: ResourceLoader
Access a description for this loader. In single index loaders this method can just return the name of the LuceneIndex.

Returns:
name of the loader
